SEARCH
Package dataaccesslayer

Interface RecipientsDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
RecipientsDaoImpl
public interface RecipientsDao
This interface defines the methods that DAO class is supposed to implement. It contains six(6) methods including returning string arrays recording metadata, retrieving all recipients and conventional CRUD.
Since:
JDK 21 (Default)
Version:
1.0
Author:
Xin Wang
See Also:
  • List
  • RecipientDTO

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addRecipient(RecipientDTO recipient)
    This method is defined to insert a recipient data in the kind of DTO to data source.
    void
    deleteRecipient(RecipientDTO recipient)
    This method is defined to delete a recipient data in the kind of DTO to data source.
    List<RecipientDTO>
    getAllRecipients()
    This method is defined to return a list including all recipients data.
    List<String[]>
    getMetaData()
    This method is defined to return a list containing string arrays recording metadata.
    RecipientDTO
    getRecipientByAwardID(Integer awardID)
    This method is defined to retrieve a recipient data in the kind of DTO according to AwardID received.
    void
    updateRecipient(RecipientDTO recipient)
    This method is defined to update a recipient data in the kind of DTO to data source.

  • Method Details

    • getMetaData

      List<String[]> getMetaData()
      This method is defined to return a list containing string arrays recording metadata.
      Returns:
      The list includes string arrays recording metadata.

    • getAllRecipients

      List<RecipientDTO> getAllRecipients()
      This method is defined to return a list including all recipients data.
      Returns:
      The list contains all recipients data.

    • getRecipientByAwardID

      RecipientDTO getRecipientByAwardID(Integer awardID)
      This method is defined to retrieve a recipient data in the kind of DTO according to AwardID received.
      Parameters:
      awardID - The AwardID received to retrieve a specific recipient
      Returns:
      The RecipientDTO based on AwardID derived

    • addRecipient

      void addRecipient(RecipientDTO recipient)
      This method is defined to insert a recipient data in the kind of DTO to data source.
      Parameters:
      recipient - The RecipientDTO received to be inserted to data source

    • updateRecipient

      void updateRecipient(RecipientDTO recipient)
      This method is defined to update a recipient data in the kind of DTO to data source.
      Parameters:
      recipient - The RecipientDTO received to be updated to data source

    • deleteRecipient

      void deleteRecipient(RecipientDTO recipient)
      This method is defined to delete a recipient data in the kind of DTO to data source.
      Parameters:
      recipient - The RecipientDTO received to be deleted in data source
